data.name: Corn Pop
data.details: Green Mountain Ganja Guys' Personal Blend: A cross of Chemdawg and Maine Only Blueberry. We really enjoy the lavender and blueberry notes in a smooth & relaxing, soft smoke. 60/40 Indica

data.name: Farm Blend
data.details: Green Mountain Ganja Guys' acquired cocktail of heirloom seeds; lovingly grown on the same hill in Maine for 30+ years with open pollination, containing: Purple Afghani Speed Queen, Fruit Punch, Queen of the Mountain, among other deliciousnesses... We'll happily have our new crop regularly & rigorously tested to better know its buzz - stay tuned.
